EmailTemplate.name: SGT-MI061_June5-6_2012.Confirmation Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Sweet Software Group Training in Houghton Lake, MI Next Week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REMINDER: Sweet Software Group Training in Houghton Lake, MI Next Week
We're looking forward to seeing you next week for our Sweet Software Group Training. If you have questions or if there is anything we can do to make this a better experience for you, please contact us at:
Kathy Swanson, Ankeny Fire Department: CONTACT FOR MORE INFORMATION: Sheila Blessing, Houghton Lake Ambulance: (989) 422-3312 | sheila@houghtonlakeambulance.com Brenda Taylor, TriTech Sales Representative: (800) 537-3927 ext. 6233 | brenda.taylor@TriTech.com
Here is a link to download a copy of the agenda, if you'd like: <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf" target="_blank>
Registration will begin on the first day at 7:45 a.m. Here is a link to download a copy of the agenda, if you'd like: Training Agenda. Registration will begin on the first day at 7:45 a.m. You are welcome to bring your laptop and follow along; there will be internet access as well.
We sincerely hope that these two days of education will allow everyone to gain knowledge in the areas desired. Although this is classroom-style training, feel free to bring a laptop if you have access to one and you will be able to participate in some “hands-on” activities. We invite you to dress casually and comfortably for the session. Since room temperatures and preferences vary from person to person, please bring a sweater or sweatshirt to wear if needed.
See you next week!
________________________________________ Sweet Software Group Training in Houghton Lake, MI on June 5-6, 2012
TRAINING LOCATION: Houghton Lake Ambulance 214 Health Parkway | Houghton Lake, MI 48629
RECOMMENDED HOTEL: Super 8 9580 W. Lake City Rd. Houghton Lake, MI 4862 Phone: (989) 422-3119 Reservations: (800) 800-8000 Rates: Single: $52.00 and Double: $62.00 (Ask for "Tritech User Group – Houghton Lake Ambulance Class" for discounted room rate)
